name: 514-1	514A-44	514-51
text:
PART I.  GENERAL PROVISIONS AND DEFINITIONS

   Title.  This chapter shall be known as the Condominium Property Act. [L 1977, c 98, pt of §2; am L 1988, c 65, §2]
Law Journals and Reviews
  Condominiums and The Sale of Securities Act.  4 HBJ, Feb 1967, at 4.
  Protecting the Deposit of the "Consumer" Who Purchases a New Condominium Apartment.  8 HBJ 103.
Case Notes
  Prior law, construed, applied.  50 H. 540, 445 P.2d 109.
